title: Welcome!
content: If this is your first time entering the world of programming, then I would love to welcome you. First we're going to go through the basics of this app and then dive deep into our first subject: Numbers!

title: Getting warmed up
content: Let's start with some basics, this is a question and it'll pop up from time to time. Don't worry if you get it wrong, it's all apart of the learning journey!

answers.explanation: If you get a question wrong, you'll get information as to why. You can retry and select another response anytime.

title: Fill in the blank
content: Sometimes you might even be faced in filling in what is missing in real code, can you guess what the blank value is suppose to be?

answers.explanation: ...hmmm not sure why you would think that

title: Let me type!
content: Even sometimes you would need to write code yourself, this is all apart of the learning journey. What would you type here to fill in the blank? (hint: its exactly the same as the previous question)
